title: Users and Role Management System
current_scope: Roles are hardcoded client-side with a dev role switcher
proposed_change: Implement full user and role management system with plant assignment, role assignment, and configurable page permissions.
reason: Enterprise deployments require proper user authentication, authorization, and administration capabilities. Must support Active Directory integration for enterprise SSO.
requirements: User management CRUD (create, read, update, delete users)
Assign users to one or many plants
Assign users or AD groups to roles (if AD integration enabled)
Admin UI for user and role management

impact.timeline: Large - requires authentication backend, user database, admin UI
impact.resources: Backend (auth system) + Frontend (admin pages) + DevOps (AD integration)
impact.quality: Critical for enterprise security and multi-user deployment
